actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, in order to provide free postage for voter registration materials and nonpartisan voter information for those States and other political subdivisions subject to the provision of section 4(a) and section 203 of the Voting Rights Act.

summary.text: Authorizes free postage for specified voter registration materials and voter information for States and specified classes of political subdivisions subject to the Voting Rights Act. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3406)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, in order to provide free postage for voter registration materials and nonpartisan voter information for those States and other political subdivisions subject to the provision of section 4(a) and section 203 of the Voting Rights Act.
